text: Stuart Mitchell (born November 2, 1964) is a former American football quarterback who played two seasons in the Arena Football League with the Denver Dynamite and Pittsburgh Gladiators. He played college football at Cornell University and attended McBurney School in Manhattan, New York. He played quarterback, tight end, and special teams for Cornell. ==References== ==External links== *Just Sports Stats Category:Living people Category:1964 births Category:Players of American football from New York (state) Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Cornell Big Red football players Category:Denver Dynamite (arena football) players Category:Pittsburgh Gladiators players Category:Sportspeople from Brooklyn
title: Stuart Mitchell (American football)
